data.answer:
Manage your finances through CIB current accounts and save yourself the hassle of carrying cash around
 
The current account is designed to facilitate your everyday banking transactions, providing you with a host of​ benefits that suit your banking needs:
A non-interest bearing current account that allows you to deposit and withdraw cash at any time and from any CIB branch​​
Cash withdrawal on demand via checks from any CIB branch, or through our vast network of more than 600 ATMs across Egypt
Offered to individuals and corporate customers
Free internet banking service enabling you to access your accounts 24/7 through​ www.cibeg.com​​
